title: Physics Olympiad Registration Open!
content:
Students interested in participating in the annual Physics Olympiad can now register. The deadline for registration is August 30, 2025. 

 For more details, please visit the school's main office.

title: Extra Classes for Baccalaureate Students
content: Additional physics classes will be held every Saturday from 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM, starting July 20, 2025. These sessions are designed to help Baccalaureate students prepare for their final exams.

title: Website Update: New Resources Available
content: Exciting news! We've added a new section to our website featuring interactive quizzes and a comprehensive search function. Explore the new resources to enhance your learning experience.
